head.title: One Killed and 8 Injured As Truck and Bus Collide

hedline.hl1: One Killed and 8 Injured As Truck and Bus Collide

abstract.p: Man is killed when pickup truck he is driving collides with New Jersey Transit bus, Sayreville, NJ; eight passengers on bus are hurt (S)

block.p: A man was killed when the pickup truck he was driving collided with a New Jersey Transit bus last night, the police said. Eight passengers on the bus were injured.

The accident occurred near the intersection of Washington Road and Truman Avenue around 9 p.m., said Lt. Gary Sczepanik of the Sayreville police. The crash was under investigation last night and the dead man's name was not released by the police.
A man was killed when the pickup truck he was driving collided with a New Jersey Transit bus last night, the police said. Eight passengers on the bus were injured.

The accident occurred near the intersection of Washington Road and Truman Avenue around 9 p.m., said Lt. Gary Sczepanik of the Sayreville police. The crash was under investigation last night and the dead man's name was not released by the police.

Residents who live near the scene of the crash told The Home News Tribune of East Brunswick that the bus had been eastbound when it collided with the westbound pickup truck, crossed the westbound lanes and came to a stop near some trees, The Associated Press reported.
Passengers were being treated at Raritan Bay Medical Center in Old Bridge and John F. Kennedy Medical Center in Edison.
